services.title: Services
services.text_airport_trasnfer: We are consistently being chosen by many executives as best airport transfer provider for Miami International Airport. As a luxury ground transportation service for business and vacation.
services.text_black_car: The best Black Car service in Miami provides transportation to exclusive clients who want the best private and safe transportation for all their needs. Our team of drivers will ensure that you arrive safely and comfortably at your desired destination.
services.title_group_car: Comfort and safety for your group
services.text_group_car: Highest level of professionalism and courtesy. Our team will work closely with you or your event coordinator to ensure that your group transportation will exceed your expectations.
services.title_disney_car: The best service for your family
services.text_disney_car: We know that our clients want to transport their family safely and comfortably on their vacation to Disney World Tour, our team will be delighted to provide the service to you and your family.
services.title_key_car: We know the best beaches in Florida
services.text_key_car: We know that Florida has the best keys in the United States and we are willing to transport you safely, comfortably and privately with your couple or family, so that you can enjoy the beautiful beaches that the state has.

fleet.text_tesla_car: The Tesla Model 3 is one of the best EVs around: practical, high-tech and boasting great performance and range. Understated styling hides a sophisticated electric drivetrain and an ultra-modern interior thatâ€™s dominated by a huge touchscreen.
fleet.text_suv_car: The 2023 Chevrolet Suburban carries the torch of one of the oldest models on the road. The Suburban is one of the trucks with the most technology, comfort, and safety, and being one of the few in the segment to have GM's level 2 autonomous driving technology, Super Cruise.
fleet.text_scalade_cars: The Cadilac Escalade is one of the most luxurious SUVs in the segment, which is why it is one of the preferred SUVs for customers who want to travel to another level.
fleet.text_sprinter_car: The Sprinter is one of the best large and refined trucks that the segment has, it has the latest technology, comfort and class that a trip in Miami can demand.
